Title: SharePoint Status Update Webpart (Facebook Style)
Description: A Status Update webpart, similar to the status update used on facebook.  This does not integrate with facebook at all.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Status Update webpart, similar to the status update used on facebook. This does not integrate with facebook at all.


Status Update Webpart.

Uses a Custom SharePoint list to display status similar to facebook.
-Supports "Liking"
-Supports Comments.

Add a simple workflow to notify creators when someone comments on a post.
